channel.title: The Blue Board — United Airlines Flight Tracker
channel.description: Real-time United Airlines operations dashboard. Live flight tracking, hub delay monitoring, Starlink WiFi fleet status, and operational analytics for all 9 United hubs.

item.title: United Airlines Live Flight Dashboard
item.description: Track every United Airlines flight in real time. 600+ flights on a live map updated every 30 seconds. Hub delay alerts, IRROPS monitoring, flight search, and weather radar.

item.title: United Airlines Fleet Database — 1,078 Aircraft
item.description: Complete United Airlines fleet database. Search 1,078 mainline aircraft by type, registration, seat configuration, WiFi, and Starlink status. Boeing 737, 757, 767, 777, 787, Airbus A319, A320, A321neo.

item.title: United Airlines Hub Airports — All 9 Hubs
item.description: Live status at all 9 United Airlines hub airports. Delays, cancellations, on-time performance at ORD, DEN, IAH, EWR, SFO, IAD, LAX, NRT, and GUM.

item.title: United Airlines at Chicago O'Hare (ORD) — Hub Status
item.description: Live United Airlines status at Chicago O'Hare. Real-time delays, cancellations, on-time performance, Starlink WiFi, and schedules. United's largest hub with ~750 daily departures.

item.title: United Airlines at Denver (DEN) — Hub Status
item.description: Live United Airlines status at Denver International. Delays, cancellations, on-time performance, Starlink WiFi. United's second-largest hub with ~540 daily departures.

item.title: United Airlines at Houston (IAH) — Hub Status
item.description: Live United Airlines status at Houston Intercontinental. Delays, cancellations, on-time performance. United's Latin America gateway with ~400 daily departures.

item.title: United Airlines at Newark (EWR) — Hub Status
item.description: Live United Airlines status at Newark Liberty. Delays, cancellations, on-time performance. United's East Coast transatlantic gateway with ~400 daily departures.

item.title: United Airlines at San Francisco (SFO) — Hub Status
item.description: Live United Airlines status at San Francisco International. Delays, cancellations, on-time performance. United's Asia-Pacific gateway with ~300 daily departures.

item.title: United Airlines at Washington Dulles (IAD) — Hub Status
item.description: Live United Airlines status at Washington Dulles. Delays, cancellations, on-time performance. ~250 daily departures.

item.title: United Airlines at Los Angeles (LAX) — Hub Status
item.description: Live United Airlines status at Los Angeles International. Delays, cancellations, on-time performance. United's Pacific gateway with ~200 daily departures.

item.title: United Airlines at Tokyo Narita (NRT) — Hub Status
item.description: Live United Airlines status at Tokyo Narita International. United's Asian hub connecting Pacific routes.

item.title: United Airlines at Guam (GUM) — Hub Status
item.description: Live United Airlines status at Guam International. United's Pacific island hub.
